OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM.synopsis: Karlach confronts Gortash after ceremony in WYR.In this dialogue, Karlach is facing the man who sold her to the devil. She hasn't talked to him in 10 years and she's furious for his betrayal. The player can allow Karlach to fight him here, but in most cases they won't.
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM.how_to_trigger: In BGO with Karlach recruited as a companion goto 28; 60; 209 and approach Gortash. After the ceremony, go to where Gortash is back again and speak with him.

PAD_KarlachSpotsPermadefeatedGortash.how_to_trigger: (Not implemented yet.)1. Recruit Karlach (Companion or avatar).2. Meet Gortash in Act 3.3. Perma-defeat him.

PAD_KarlachInPrison.synopsis: Karlach is inside her cell after being sent to prison during the ceremony.
PAD_KarlachInPrison.how_to_trigger: (Not implemented yet)1. Load BGO_Main_A.2. Recruit Karlach as a companion.3. goto 25; 60; 2094. Approach Gortash and let him send Karlach to prison.5. goto 47; 8; -706

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Dialog with Gortash in his office.Possible outcomes:1. You visited Steel Foundry and the destroyed Control Centre - he attacks you.2. You visited Steel Foundry, didn't destroy the Control Centre, but someone activated Dead Man switch which destroyed Iron T hrone. He attacks you.3. You visited Iron Throne which caused the destruction of it. He tells you - "I warned you" and then attacks you.4. You didn't kill Orin.5. You killed Orin and you have both Netherstones.6. Fallback node which includes the case where you killed Orin, but didn't bring either of the netherstones.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_7.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_7.text: Dearest Karlach. I'd busy myself finding Orin if I were you. I'll still be here for any unfinished business, once you've secured your camp.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_13.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_13.text: That's it? That's all you have to say to me?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_56.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_56.text: Were you hoping for something else? A word of wisdom? A hug?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_24.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_24.text: Thanks to you, I don't hope for things anymore. I just take whatever it is I want. See you soon, motherfucker.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_34.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_34.text: This was your doing, wasn't it, Karlach? The destruction of my Steel Watch. Such a petty vengeance.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_29.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_29.text: Those things were evil - just like their papa.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_26.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_26.text: To think I ever worked for you. Proudly, too.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_46.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_46.text: It's hard to keep a good woman down, isn't it, Karlach?
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_46.context: NodeContext: Voice dripping with sarcasm. He doesn't actually respect her, but he feigns it.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_59.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_59.text: I don't know. You managed it for a solid decade.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_22.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_22.text: I never meant to harm you, dear, merely to help you realise your vast potential.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_18.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_18.text: You sent me to the Hells. You let Zariel take my heart. As though any of it was yours to give away.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_9.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_9.text: The greater good, Karlach. Something I wouldn't expect you to understand.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_58.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_58.text: You feel no regret, do you. All right. How about fear then?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_61.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_61.text: You can't hurt me. You need me. Whether you and your friend realise it or not.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_11.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_11.text: Oh, you do quite misunderstand. I've already made a deal with your companion. We need each other.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_48.speaker: Player
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_48.text: Orin's dead, and the Steel Watch is destroyed. I don't think we need much else from you, Gortash.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_64.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_64.text: How wrong you are. You have no clue how to control the elder brain. It will destroy the Sword Coast, yourself included. Together, we can tame it.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_41.speaker: Player
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_41.text: Easy, Karlach; we won't make it far against the Steel Watch.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_16.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_16.text: Listen to reason, for once in your life. I'm sorry you feel wronged about how things ended between us, but that was ten years ago. We must look to the future.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_21.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_21.text: There will come a time, sooner than you think, when death comes knocking on your door. You'll swing that door open, and you'll cower before what you see, and you'll beg, 'Please, Karlach. Spare me.'

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_17.speaker: Player
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_17.text: Let's not be too hasty. We ought to respect our alliance with Gortash.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_0.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_0.text: The man doesn't know the meaning of the word respect. He'll double cross us at the first opportunity.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_51.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_51.text: You're wrong, Karlach. I'm sorry you're still sore about how things ended between us, but that was ten years ago. We must look to the future.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_37.speaker: Player
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_37.text: No; I never agreed to ally with him.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_10.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_10.text: Whether or not you accepted my generous offer, the fact stands that you cannot control the elder brain without my expertise.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_65.speaker: Player
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_65.text: Never mind that, Gortash; we've heard all we need from the likes of you.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_5.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_5.text: You ought to reconsider. Divided, the elder brain will create an illithid army, yourself included in its ranks. Together, we can tame it.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_23.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_23.text: I'm sorry you feel wronged by how things ended between us all those years ago. But now, we must look to the future.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_20.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_20.text: You make it sound like we were lovers. Or friends. But that wasn't it.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_57.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_57.text: I trusted you. I respected you. It was my job to protect you, and that's what I did.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_12.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_12.text: I was so young. I didn't recognise evil when I saw it.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_66.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_66.text: When you turned on me, I was too dumbstruck to realise what was happening. No way he'd hurt me, I thought.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_44.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_44.text: You betrayed me for reasons I still don't quite understand. But I suppose evil has no real cause. It just is.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_33.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_33.text: You utter brat. You're going to burn this place down!

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_47.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_47.text: No. You have to stop her. Do it! Now!

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_40.speaker: Player
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_40.text: Karlach, stop this. You're burning too hot.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_1.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_1.text: Then run while you still can.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_38.speaker: Player
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_38.text: Get out of here while you can, Gortash.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_55.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_55.text: You can't escape me. Wherever you go, I'll find you. Wherever you run, there I'll be.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_2.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_2.text: Don't lecture me about goodness. You don't know the first thing about it.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_42.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_42.text: But I do. I give a shit. I don't hurt the people I love. And I keep my promises, too.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_49.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_49.text: Ah - a familiar face, and a fondly-remembered one indeed. How have you been, Karlach?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_3.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_3.context: NodeContext: Enuniciating each word with import.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_54.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_54.text: You're agitated. I'd keep an eye on that. My Steel Watch are sensitive to anything they perceive as a threat.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_45.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_COM_45.text: Very clever, fabricating people to do your fighting for you. But they won't be able to protect you forever, Gortash.

PAD_KarlachSpotsPermadefeatedGortash_0.speaker: Karlach
PAD_KarlachSpotsPermadefeatedGortash_0.context: NodeContext: Dead. This is before her big mortality showstopper, so her emotion is flat and stunned here. Spotting Gortash's corpse for the first time.

PAD_KarlachInPrison_0.speaker: Karlach
PAD_KarlachInPrison_0.text: The second I'm out of here...

PAD_KarlachInPrison_1.speaker: Karlach
PAD_KarlachInPrison_1.context: NodeContext: player is stuck in the cell with her.

PAD_KarlachInPrison_2.speaker: Karlach
PAD_KarlachInPrison_2.text: He's toast. I don't care how many big shiny boys he has.

PAD_KarlachInPrison_3.speaker: Karlach
PAD_KarlachInPrison_3.text: You won't be much help from in here, soldier.
PAD_KarlachInPrison_3.context: NodeContext: player is stuck in the cell with her.

PAD_KarlachInPrison_4.speaker: Karlach
PAD_KarlachInPrison_4.context: NodeContext: Stuck in jail after seeing Gortash. She's fuming but not shouting.

PAD_KarlachInPrison_5.speaker: Karlach
PAD_KarlachInPrison_5.text: We need out of here yesterday.
PAD_KarlachInPrison_5.context: NodeContext: player is stuck in the cell with her.

PAD_KarlachInPrison_6.speaker: Karlach
PAD_KarlachInPrison_6.text: Tsk tsk. The Dead Three out there, and us in here.
PAD_KarlachInPrison_6.context: NodeContext: player is stuck in the cell with her.

PAD_KarlachInPrison_7.speaker: Karlach
PAD_KarlachInPrison_7.text: This fucking cell smells like eggs.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_44.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_44.text: Yet you've returned without Orin's. This was not the agreement.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_10.text: I don't give a shit about your agreement.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_5.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_5.text: Then why in the Nine Hells have you come back here, Karlach? What could you possibly want?!

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_33.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_33.text: How about an apology for sending me to the Hells?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.text: Sorry?! You want me to be sorry for helping you gain more power than you've ever known?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_84.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_84.text: That thing in your chest is a blessing I helped you receive. One you're too much of a fool to see.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_10.text: I gave you a clean slate. A chance to rejoin me for our mutual benefit - again.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_12.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_12.text: Yet you snubbed my warning and brought my Iron Throne to ruin.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_77.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_77.text: The brain awakens. It's time I take matters into my own hands.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_21.text: We could have moved mountains, we could have shaken the planes. And you chose imperfection.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_54.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_54.text: Yet you sowed chaos at my Iron Throne. You blatantly mocked the terms of my bargain.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_11.text: Yet you struck my Steel Watch. You blatantly mocked the terms of my bargain.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.text: Yet Orin still lives, still holds her stone. You blatantly mock the terms of my bargain.
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.context: NodeContext: Angry - note, 'mock' is present tense on purpose

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_71.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_71.text: From you? I guess nothing. Not anymore.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_12.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_12.text: I had high hopes for you. Ones you've dashed to pieces - again.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_21.text: However little I think of you, you always manage to find a way to make me hate you even more.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_18.text: Enough of the dramatics. You're nursing a wound long-healed. We had the chance to  do something truly incredible here. Now. Not a short lifetime ago.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_16.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_16.text: I'm working on it - but not for your benefit.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_36.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_36.text: You're 'working on it' are you? You used your time to break our agreement and bring my Iron Throne to ruin.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_34.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_34.text: And what is it you're working on, hmm? Seeding chaos upon my Iron Throne? Defying our agreement?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_20.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_20.text: Why in the Nine Hells have you come back here, Karlach? What could you possibly want, after what you've done?!

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_10.text: That much is clear. You've stricken out at my Steel Watch for reasons that are utterly incomprehensible.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_16.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_16.text: You're 'working on it' are you? And what do you have to show for yourself? Nothing!

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_32.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_32.text: Why in the Nine Hells have you come back here, Karlach? What could you possibly want?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.text: Give me time. Our lord wills it.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_47.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_47.text: You betrayed our lord by ignoring his Chosen. I speak; you obey.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_72.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_72.text: Turns out I don't want to play your little game. I've had enough of those to last a lifetime.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_50.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_50.text: Have you come to dredge up an ancient grudge, Karlach? Now? When so much hangs in the balance?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_22.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash raises his arm, showing his gauntlet. The Netherstone in it does not gleam, but remains as it is. He lowers his arms.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_35.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_35.text: Karlach. You've no resonance about you at all. No Netherstones - not even Ketheric Thorm's.
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash raises his arm, showing his gauntlet. The Netherstone in it gleams. He lowers his arms. Then only he speaks the line... [Choices]

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_40.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_40.text: We will meet under the city and take control of the brain. Then we will take our rightful place as its rulers.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_96.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_96.text: Dearest Karlach. I'd busy myself finding Orin if I were you. I'll still be here for any unfinished business, once you've secured your camp.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_16.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_16.text: That's it? That's all you have to say to me?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_46.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_46.text: Were you hoping for something else? A word of wisdom? A hug?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_43.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_43.text: Thanks to you, I don't hope for things anymore. I just take whatever it is I want.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_80.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_80.text: You want to kill Orin and retrieve the stone. Trust me.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_59.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_59.text: Trust you? That's a good one; tell another.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_14.text: I can't change the past - and I'm not even sure I would if I could. Look what you've become: An impressive power in your own right.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_21.text: I'm not a naive kid anymore. And I don't take orders from you.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_68.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_68.text: Consider it an invitation then. For you to save your own life before it's too late.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_10.text: I'm proud of you, Karlach. Proud of what you've accomplished. And I look forward to working together as allies - equals - from this moment on.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_10.text: Do not squander this opportunity. It may be the last one you get.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_51.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_51.context: NodeContext: Hostile, but not combat - just shooing her away.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_11.text: You better follow through on your end of the deal.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.text: You can count on me, Karlach. I promise.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.text: Don't patronise me. Not after everything you've done.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_18.text: Then stop acting like a child. The past is done, Karlach. Never to return again. And the present is bearing down on our necks like a hobnailed boot.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_65.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_65.text: Trust me that your best chance of survival is to kill Orin and retrieve the stone.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_87.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_87.text: I'll be back, motherfucker. See you soon.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_49.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_49.text: You ought to be worried about your own hide.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_52.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_52.text: One benefit of becoming the Archduke of Baldur's Gate is that you have a whole legion of soldiers to worry about that for you.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_70.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_70.text: Unless you want to provoke them, my dear, I suggest you hurry on your way.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_21.text: Your time in the Hells has taught you nothing. You remain the same impulsive little brute you've always been. I haven't missed you at all, you know - and I won't miss you when you're dead, either.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.text: You're mistaken. I'd like to finish our business now.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_19.text: Orin is in your camp as we speak, committing who knows what unspeakable horrors. Whatever festering grudge you bear toward me is of little importance by comparison.
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_19.context: NodeContext: Ready to fight. Staying cool, but a hint of villainy

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_18.text: I'm sure even you can appreciate that.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.text: I warned you, Karlach. You could have walked away. But you hunger for petty vengeance won out, didn't it?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_14.text: Your actions sparked the fall of my Iron Throne. Whatever alliance we might have made fell with it.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_20.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_20.text: God, it's good to watch you suffer.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_14.text: You don't know the meaning of the word!
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_14.context: NodeContext: Furious - a threat. Cut off as an earthquake starts to rattle the room

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.text: I trusted you once. I was so naive, and you took advantage of that.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_89.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_89.text: 'Took advantage.' Like you were some waif without a will of her own? You threw your lot in with mine. Willingly. Whatever came next falls at your feet, Karlach.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.text: You live in a fantasy world. One where everyone is to blame but yourself.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_20.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_20.text: I don't care about blame. I care about progress. I care about power. That is why you are a servant and I am a master.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_53.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_53.text: I was young. You should have been my mentor, not my betrayer.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_20.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_20.text: You knew what I was. Yet you were fool enough to think the rules didn't apply to you.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_14.text: The only thing that's about to fall at my feet is you.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_13.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_13.text: Thanks to you, I endured more suffering than you could begin to fathom.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_98.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_98.text: Please. That thing in your chest made you more powerful than you could ever have dreamed of. I conspired to  give you a gift, and you're furious about it.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_76.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_76.text: If you can't seize power when it's given to you, then you're destined to live as a servant. I do not suffer the same affliction.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.text: It's over for you, Gortash. Take one last look at me, cause I'm the last thing you'll ever see.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_74.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_74.text: Listen to yourself, Karlach! Blind to every opportunity.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_12.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_12.text: That thing in your chest made you more powerful than you could ever have dreamed of. I conspired to  give you a gift, and you're furious about it.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_73.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_73.text: I did what I had to. I have no regrets.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_14.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_14.text: Not yet. But you will, when I'm done with you.
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_14.context: NodeContext: Cut off as an earthquake starts to rattle the room

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_31.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_31.text: An alliance? You must be joking.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_13.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_13.text: Bane wills us to work together.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_28.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_28.text: You betrayed our lord by ignoring his Chosen. You always were a fool.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player enters Gortash's room, and Gortash smiles wide.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_78.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash raises his arm, showing his gauntlet. The Netherstone in it gleams. He lowers his arms.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_81.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_81.text: Well, well well! I was certain you'd scupper our alliance in service of an ancient, petty grudge. You've surprised me.
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_81.context: CinematicNodeContext: Gortash raises his arm, showing his gauntlet. The Netherstone in it gleams. He lowers his arms. Then only he speaks the line... [Choices]

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_16.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_16.text: You've killed Orin - and brought me two Netherstones. It is time, my dear. Time to become what we were meant to be.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_66.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_66.text: How can I trust you now, Gortash? After everything you did to me?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_19.text: I helped you realise your potential. Look at you now, Karlach. You stand at the precipice of a new era.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_0.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_0.text: Do not allow some silly, bitter complaint to taint that.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.context: CinematicNodeContext: The room shakes from a "brainquake".

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.text: The brain awakens - we must act now. Faithful, come forward.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_26.context: CinematicNodeContext: Several Banites step from the corner shadows, one at a time. They look fierce and dangerous.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Finally, the Steel Watcher stepw forward. It activates, looking devastatingly powerful.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_22.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_22.text: Hand me the Netherstones, and we will rule as one.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_55.speaker: Lae'zel
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_55.text: Kill him and take his stone. The Grand Design cannot come to pass.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Shadowheart
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.text: I've met venomous snakes I'd be faster to trust. Are you sure about this?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_20.speaker: Astarion
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_20.text: Maybe it's just me, but I don't trust someone who worships the god of tyranny to share his power.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_61.speaker: Wyll
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_61.text: Do what he asks. My father's life is in his hands.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Gale
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_19.text: Are you sure we should be trusting him?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_22.speaker: Halsin
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_22.text: Surely none but a boiled turnip would trust the likes of him.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Jaheira
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_2.text: That is the royal 'we', I think. Little men do not like to share power.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_95.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_95.text: Take the Netherstones. I deserve the power you promised - even if I have to share it with the likes of you.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_93.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_93.text: Take the Netherstone. I deserve the power you promised - even if I have to share it with the likes of you.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_60.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_60.text: Take the Netherstone. I deserve the power you promised - even if I have to share it with the likes of you.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_97.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_97.context: NodeContext: Genuine disappointment. This is a major turning point cause we are giving him what he asked for - but it was a test. He wanted us to resist.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_69.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_69.text: I'd hoped  that, by now, you'd manage to demonstrate a little more gravitas. A little leadership.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_19.text: Truthfully, I have no need for an ally who gives away her power at the first ask. I have enough underlings. I want an equal.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_13.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_13.text: I don't have them on me. Give me a little time to retrieve them, and they're yours.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_21.text: I'm not giving you anything. If we'll both rule, we can each keep our stones.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_75.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_75.text: Give me the stone now, Karlach, or face the black hand of Lord Bane.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_19.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_19.text: How like you, Karlach. You give in with the slightest bit of pressure.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.text: You're a disappointment. Again. I've no use for such a weak ally.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_39.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_39.text: I think I'll take that second horn of yours and use it as a goblet.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_45.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_45.text: Wouldn't that be fitting? A servant even past your dying day.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.text: Good-bye Karlach. I didn't miss you before, and I won't miss you now.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_13.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_13.text: I don't have them on me. Give me a little time to retrieve them, and they're yours.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.text: Yes! That's the spirit, my dear! Not so long ago you did as you were told, no questions asked.
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.context: NodeContext: Very pleased with himself, and with the player.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_18.text: Your time in the Hells has toughened you up. Made a worthy partner out of you.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_11.text: Our time is short. The elder brain is held beneath the city. We must go to it if we're to control it.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_16.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_16.text: There is a vessel to the Morphic Pool, where the brain feeds. I will wait for you there.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_63.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_63.text: With the Netherstones in hand, the brain can't resist us. We will be Absolute, with an infected army at our beck and call.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_23.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_23.text: First, we take Baldur's Gate, then Faerûn. All of Toril will soon follow. A thousand kingdoms, at our command.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.text: It was always meant to be like this, Karlach. You and I, ruling side by side. Let a new dawn begin.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_11.text: Study Gortash. What are his intentions?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_79.speaker: Narrator
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_79.text: *You spot the hint of a smile. He is testing you - he wants you to refuse.*

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_12.speaker: Narrator
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_12.text: *There is no telling what schemes Gortash could be planning.*

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_30.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_30.text: Study Gortash again. What more can you glean?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_64.speaker: Narrator
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_64.text: *Gortash studies you carefully in turn. He is shrewd and headstrong, and he expects the same of you.*

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_29.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_29.text: I hope this girl has grown a backbone. Otherwise, I'll have to send her back where she came from.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_10.text: Prove your worth, Karlach. Do not buckle at the slightest pressure. Go on. Refuse me.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_11.text: Study Gortash. We can't trust this prick, can we?

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_9.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_9.text: Dream on, Gortash. You're dead. Just like me, but sooner.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_88.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_88.text: You child. You imprudent wretch. I always knew you were good for nothing - that's why I gave you to Zariel without a second thought.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Minsc
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_21.text: The only thing I will hand you is my fist, tyrant. And there will be a sword in it.
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_21.context: NodeContext: First line delivered as if it's a snappy comeback. Second line is a necessary amendment in case his meaning wasn' t clear

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_25.speaker: Nightwarden Minthara
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_25.text: Relinquishing the stone to him makes us servants, not allies. We should keep what we have earned.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_22.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_22.text: I am who I'm meant to be. You have nothing to do with it.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_20.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_20.text: On the contrary. I made you. That thing in your heart has made you more powerful than you had any right to be. You're welcome.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_3.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_3.text: This thing in my chest is killing me, you know. You did that.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_10.text: And now I'm giving you the power to become as a god - a ruler of the realm.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_18.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_18.text: Your actions sparked the fall of my Steel Watch. Whatever bargain we might have made fell with it.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_11.text: Karlach. I was wondering when you'd come.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_27.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_27.text: I didn't enjoy watching you make a mess of our plans. It pains me to witness your potential wasted - again.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.text: A lackey once more, hey, Karlach? Pitiful. Bring your leader if you wish to speak to me. I don't waste time on flunkeys.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Karlach
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_11.text: Gods, I can't wait to kill you.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.text: Not if I kill you first.
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_15.context: NodeContext: A bit psycho; mock friendliness like 'not if I see you first' but perverted

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_17.text: You have work to do, my dear.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_8.text: Karlach. I was wondering when you'd come.

OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Lord Enver Gortash
OM_KarlachAndGortashEncounter_AOM_OOM_11.text: Your actions sparked the fall of my Iron Throne. Whatever bargain we might have made fell with it.
